name: Infinity Bird
short_description:
Infinity Bird is a game that goes beyond the birds. Infinity Bird provides user with an immersive and addicting game plan. There are more than 15 achievements and coming. The game is available for all computer operating systems.  The game was created for touch screen laptops and computers but it still works for normal devices. We are still at the alpha stage of development for Infinity Bird. 
We came up with this idea because our friends and family members were getting bored of similar games. We did some research on these two problems and came up with a conclusion, Flappy Bird is missing three elements, the first being there was no way of users to customise the game, the second being there was no sense of achievement once you completed the game, and the third being the game didn't have a list of achievements or goals to complete! After a while of research we decided to do our part and patch these problems up with Infinity Bird! The game is at its very early stages, and we are still wo
